document.full_text: gov. nathan deal says he will sign a bill, similar to the controversial arizona legislation, that will allow the police to investigate immigration status and outlawing the use of fake identification to get a job.
document.title: immigrants are subject of tough bill in georgia
lines_and_colors: gov. nathan deal says he will sign a bill, similar to the controversial arizona legislation, that will allow the police to investigate immigration status and outlawing the use of fake identification to get a job.
